name: Extra Markdown viewer settings
description: Pagination, font family and size customization for Joplin's Markdown viewer. Supports mobile and desktop. (Beta).
author: Henry Heino

screenshots.label: Screenshot: A single page of a note with math is rendered. A page number is shown at the bottom of the screen and the text uses a medium, serif font.
Screenshot: Shows a settings dialog above the editor including font size and pagination settings
Screenshot: Shows a paginated copy of Joplin's welcome notes. Arrows are available to switch pages
